00005 #include <nacl/npupp.h>
00006 #include <pgl/pgl.h>
00007 
00008 // These functions are called when a module instance is first loaded, and when
00009 // the module instance is finally deleted.  They must use C-style linkage.
00010 
00011 extern "C" {
00012 
00013 // Populates |plugin_funcs| by calling InitializePluginFunctions.
00014 // Declaration: npupp.h
00015 // Documentation URL: N/A
00016 NPError NP_GetEntryPoints(NPPluginFuncs* plugin_funcs) {
00017   extern NPError InitializePluginFunctions(NPPluginFuncs* plugin_funcs);
00018   return InitializePluginFunctions(plugin_funcs);
00019 }
00020 
00021 // Some platforms, including Native Client, use the two-parameter version of
00022 // NP_Initialize(), and do not call NP_GetEntryPoints().  Others (Mac, e.g.)
00023 // use single-parameter version of NP_Initialize(), and then call
00024 // NP_GetEntryPoints() to get the NPP functions.  Also, the NPN entry points
00025 // are defined by the Native Client loader, but are not defined in the trusted
00026 // plugin loader (and must be filled in in NP_Initialize()).
00027 
00028 // Called when the first instance of this plugin is first allocated to
00029 // initialize global state.  The browser is hereby telling the plugin its
00030 // interface in |browser_functions| and expects the plugin to populate
00031 // |plugin_functions| in return.  Memory allocated by this function may only
00032 // be cleaned up by NP_Shutdown.
00033 // returns an NPError if anything went wrong.
00034 // Declaration: npupp.h
00035 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NP_Initialize
00036 NPError NP_Initialize(NPNetscapeFuncs* browser_functions,
00037                       NPPluginFuncs* plugin_functions) {
00038   NPError np_err = NP_GetEntryPoints(plugin_functions);
00039   if (NPERR_NO_ERROR == np_err)
00040     pglInitialize();
00041   return np_err;
00042 }
00043 
00044 // Called just before the plugin itself is completely unloaded from the
00045 // browser.  Should clean up anything allocated by NP_Initialize.
00046 // Declaration: npupp.h
00047 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NP_Shutdown
00048 NPError NP_Shutdown() {
00049   pglTerminate();
00050   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00051 }
00052 
00053 }  // extern "C"
